## SUPPRESS\_AUTH\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of SuppressAuthInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SUPPRESS_AUTH_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
